```{r}
alpha <- 45
beta <- 55

mean_beta <- alpha / (alpha + beta)
mode_beta <- (alpha - 1) / (alpha + beta - 2)
var_beta <- (alpha * beta) / ((alpha + beta)^2 * (alpha + beta + 1))
sd_beta <- sqrt(var_beta)

print(paste("Mean:", mean_beta))
print(paste("Mode:", mode_beta))
print(paste("Variance:", var_beta))
print(paste("Standard Deviation:", sd_beta))

# Plot the Beta
plot_beta(alpha, beta)
